thread.title: Chelsea FC news: David Luiz sparks injury fears with worrying Instagram post | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea FC news: David Luiz sparks injury fears with worrying Instagram post | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea FC news: David Luiz sparks injury fears with worrying Instagram post | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 9:37 pm David Luiz was seen struggling during Chelsea’s clash with Burnley (Picture: Getty) 
David Luiz has sparked injury fears by posting a picture which appears to show the Chelsea defender receiving treatment. 
The Brazilian has struggled with a knee problem in recent weeks and Antonio Conte labelled him a ‘warrior’ for the way he has dealt with the injury. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Luiz once again had strapping around his right leg during the 1-1 draw at Burnley on Sunday and was seen limping at stages of the match and grimacing in pain. 
And the 29-year-old has left Chelsea fans sweating after uploading a picture on Instagram Stories following the stalemate at Turf Moor. Chelsea defender David Luiz uploaded the picture to Instagram (Picture: Instagram) Here’s how Chelsea fans reacted to the picture… David Luiz's knee injury is getting more and more serious every game he has, we seriously need to rest him before it gets worse. Praying. pic.twitter.com/uoZpoG9zG1
